name: The Importance of Happiness and Sadness
name_original: The Importance of Happiness and Sadness
description:
This is a small game which I made last year for a school project of mine.

It is an idle game about Happiness and Sadness.

In the game, you will see that Happiness and Sadness are both interconnected, meaning that you cannot have the one without the other.

The game is won ones ... well you will see :)
